column4: erm, any tips for getting fonts to look half decent in Ubuntu? Mainly monospace fonts - both Monospace and Inconsolata look rubbish - very blurry, and the spacing between letters is wrong
And all monospace fonts look very light - no definition to them at all
mewnu>system>preferences>appearence>fonts change subpixel smoothing if on lcd
that doesn't fix the fact that characters overlap with some fonts
